name: Hide Pause Menu
description: Adds a hide button the pause menu to hide it.

issues.info: If you find any bugs, please report them on GitHub.

hide_button_pos.name: Button Position
hide_button_pos.description: Position of the button inside the pause menu.

screenshot_mode.name: Screenshot Mode
screenshot_mode.description:
Hide the 'Hide Pause Menu' button when the Pause Menu is hidden.
With this enabled, just click/tap the screen to re-show the Pause Menu.

end_level_button.name: Hide End Level Menu
end_level_button.description: Adds the Hide Pause Menu button behavior on the vanilla Hide End Level Menu button.

end_level_screenshot_mode.name: End Level Screenshot Mode
end_level_screenshot_mode.description:
Hide the 'Hide End Level Menu' button when the End Level Menu is hidden.
With this enabled, just click/tap the screen to re-show the End Level Menu.

auto-hide-settings.name: Auto hide settings
auto-hide-settings.description: Parts of the level layer that will be automatically hidden when hiding the pause menu.

hide_progress_bar.name: Hide Progress Bar
hide_progress_bar.description: Hides the progress bar when the pause menu is hidden.

hide_percentage.name: Hide Percentage
hide_percentage.description: Hides the percentage when the pause menu is hidden.

hide_time.name: Hide Platformer Time
hide_time.description: Hides the time when the pause menu is hidden.

hide_info_label.name: Hide Info Label
hide_info_label.description: Hides the info label when the pause menu is hidden.

hide_attemps.name: Hide Attemps
hide_attemps.description: Hides attemps when the pause menu is hidden.

hide_practice_attemps.name: Hide Practice Attemps
hide_practice_attemps.description: Hides practice attemps when the pause menu is hidden.

hide_checkpoints.name: Hide Practice Checkpoints
hide_checkpoints.description: Hides practice checkpoints when the pause menu is hidden.

hide_ui_layer.name: Hide UI Layer
hide_ui_layer.description:
Hides UI layer when the pause menu is hidden.
The UI Layer contain practice buttons, audio visualizer and other mods StartPos switchers and labels.

hide_practice_buttons.enable-if-description: Hide UI Layer setting already hide this
hide_practice_buttons.name: Hide Practice Buttons
hide_practice_buttons.description: Hides practice buttons when the pause menu is hidden.

hide_audio_visualizer.enable-if-description: Hide UI Layer setting already hide this
hide_audio_visualizer.name: Hide Audio Visualizer
hide_audio_visualizer.description: Hides the audio visualizer SFX and BG when the pause menu is hidden.

hide_mod_menus.name: Hide Mod Menus
hide_mod_menus.description:
Hides floating button used by some mod menus when the pause menu is hidden.
This only makes the button invisible, it stays clickable.
If this hides something unexpected, open an issue on GitHub.
